name: akubelaSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen lights.”
”Alexa, dim the ceiling light by seventy percent.”
”Alexa, activate movie scene.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enhance your smart home experience with Alexa and the akubela System.
Now, effortlessly control a wide range of devices including switches, dimmers, plugs, lights, TVs, ACs, fans, and various scenes, all integrated seamlessly through the akubela smart home system. Simply use voice commands via Alexa for convenient control. 
Before starting, make sure you have an akubela account and at least one akubela HyPanel device in your home. 
To enable this functionality, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App and then log in with your akubela credentials. This will link your account and allow Alexa to discover and control your akubela-integrated devices and scenes.
